27072019.desc:
Welcome to ReMind !

This application will allow you to store any task or events to better manage your schedule.

❶ To create a new Task , just press the button on the left side of your screen with the plus ( + ) !

❷ You can chose to only see tasks marked as important and also you can chose to hide the tasks that have been completed .

❸ To navigate through the days and weeks, use the arrows on the left side or press the Calendar button which will open the following menu :



❹ By default, the application will only minimize when you try to close it, indeed, you will not receive any notification once the application is closed. You can change that in the settings which you can access thanks to the button in the bottom left corner.

❺ When creating a task, you can add a repeat value to the task so you don't have to create it every day or every week. You can also add a notification setting.

Notifications will only be sent if it is enabled in the settings and if the app is located in the start menu for Windows 10 devices.


❻ You can use the following buttons to complete or delete a task :



❼ You can add images in the description using the following syntax:
IMG[path/to/image.png,width,height] ( ! ) Any white-space in the syntax will break.

❽ The task description supports twitch and youtube players by adding a link to a youtube video or to a twitch channel.

❾ For developers : You can use any HTML code or JavaScript code if inside a script tag within the description or title of a task.
27072019.title: Tutorial
